function.description: User can input their height in either feet and inches or centimeters.
User can input their weight in either pounds or kilograms.
User can select the units for height (feet/inches or centimeters) and weight (pounds or kilograms).
User can trigger the BMI calculation after entering their height and weight.
The calculated BMI value is clearly displayed to the user.
The BMI result is interpreted and displayed, indicating the user's weight category (e.g., underweight, normal weight, overweight, obese).
User can reset the form to clear the entered height and weight values.
The calculator handles invalid input (e.g., non-numeric values, zero or negative values) and displays appropriate error messages.
